result.arabic_text: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ فَضۡلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرٗا
result.translation: nevertheless it is a mercy from your Lord[77], for His favor to you is truly great.
result.footnotes: [77] Allah would not take away the Qur’an, out of mercy to His Prophet and to His servants.
